name: deimosrising
text: Lyle/Ray interaction is in some ways my favorite. They seem to understand each other on a base level. When they talk, so much goes unsaid.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by cryptfiend85, farqussus, Aki)

name: peterjoel
text:
Lyle likes alcohol. Ray has alcohol. It's not a complex interaction...

Reminds me of a girlfriend I once had actually..

name: tekende
text: Was she the one who had alcohol, or the one who liked it?

name: invidious
text: Yes.

name: tasteful
text: your avatar really complements this

name: jhunter
text:
I had these two friends who were basically Lyle and Ray. Hadn't met each other, did so through me, kinda had a bit of awkward conversation at a party. The Ray ended up making out with the Lyles girlfriend and the Lyle ended up getting so drunk he puked in a hat.

The moral of this story is don't make out with other peoples girlfriends or vomit into hats, especially if it's my god damned hat

name: awko
text: A baseball cap can hold the average puke

name: centipede_damascus
text: Spike was a man who lived in hard times. I have a lot of respect for that dude.

name: philosophe
text: he came from Circumstances

name: cousinted
text: He also had questionable relations with cacti.

name: mustakrakesh
text: And some mixed feelings concering the post office considering the ALT text

name: fuckyoufriday
text: A comment left by fuckyoufriday was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by joeyramoney, smugairle, chaesar, Chachibenji)

name: epicurus
text: Panel 2 is what I would say if you asked me about Sangria, but I know it is wrong.

name: overmedicated
text: Is that right.

name: gormster
text: Actually I'm pretty sure he's right.

name: epicurus
text: God that is sad.

name: choosebro
text: I thought that it was Spanish, not Mexican, though.

name: boredom_man
text: It is Spanish, not Mexican, and I'm not sure it was so much religious fervor as "man, this shit is so tasty we're naming it after JESUS!" but I weren't there

name: greenkoolayd
text: everything is spain is religious.

name: never_die
text: ray in a sombrero is an image which needs to be used more often.

name: caseyb3
text: Ray knows a gentleman serves Mexican wine with a sombrero, French wine with a beret, and German wine with a single bullet.

name: greenkoolayd
text: tequila is mexican wine?

name: petro
text: The word "Sangr�a" litterally means "a bleeding," so one would suspect that Ray is right.

name: nicolae
text: Of course he is, haven't you ever seen that Sanford & Son boxset commercial?

name: kledermans
text: Dude, Spike was Snoopy's brother, not just some cousin.

name: saulbellow
text: Yeah, I forgot about spike until now.  TO MY ARCHIVES!

name: mastronaut
text: the ENTIRE joke here is in the alt text:  Spike was on government disability, when he worked at the post office some dude threw a rock real hard at his legs

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by catgrl131, cailetshadow, saucy_jack, SPECTRE)

name: hyetal
text: Careful.  If they figure out that's a Family Guy reference, you're in for it.

name: farqussus
text: as long as there are people with lolcats for avatars, and no concept of irony, i feel fine.

name: charchar
text: Was there ever any investigation into the rock-throwing being a hate crime against hispanics/ postal workers/beagles? A great injustice may have been wrought.

name: spectre
text: More to the point, where was Pat that day?

name: tekende
text: I bet Pat hates postal workers.

name: jthm_guitarist
text: Haha, I think the alt text should have been worked into the comic somehow.

name: irondave
text: Isn't it?  Worked in, I mean?

name: tekende
text: It's worked in good and tight.

name: aelindil
text: That's what she said.

name: mercuri0us
text: Almost sounds like they're not even talking about the same person. Have you ever had one of those conversations?

name: tekende
text: That, and they obviously know nothing about the character. They're just making up complete bullshit.

name: ssddr
text: Drinkn' sombrero

name: puguglypress
text: Charles Schulz couldn't write Minorities very well

name: ham_shoes
text: Pat brings over some sangria almost four years before the Gladdington Castle thing.  Sounds like it was gonna happen, curse or no

name: tripleg
text: That... quickly went a place I did not expect.
